text:
@USDA @usdafsa @FarmersGov @SecretarySonny CFAP? Farmers were decimated by Trump's tarrifs. Great job blaming COVID19.

Farmers of America deserve the respect of assistance because Trump destroyed the farming industry. But, don't lie to us.
